name: แฟ้มประวัติผู้ป่วย

format:
<style>

    @font-face {
        font-family: "D7MI";
        src: url("/branda-font/Branda-yolq.ttf") format('ttf');
    }

    body {
        background-color : #441752 !important;
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        background-position: right top;
        background-size: 100%;
        width : 100vw !important;
    }
    .box{
        background-color: #441752 !important;
        background-image : url("/reel.png") !important;
        /* background-repeat: no-repeat; */
        background-position: center;
        background-size: 100%;
        width : 100vw !important;
        height : 92vh !important;
        border-radius: 16px !important;
    }

    /* .nr-dashboard-cardtitle{
        background-color : #2A004E !important;
        border-radius: 5px;
        width : 93vw !important;
        text-align: center !important;
    } */

    .player24{
        background-color : rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5) !important;
        border: 5px solid yellow;
        font-size: 40px;
        width : 20vw !important;
    }

    .player180{
    background-color : rgba(255, 255, 255, 1) !important;
    border: 5px solid yellow;
    font-size: 120px;
    text-align: center !important;
    width : 64vw !important;
    height : 56vh !important;
    }

    .visible{
        border-radius : 12px;
        width : 100vw important;
    }
</style>

name: dashboard style
format:
<style>
    body {
        background-image: url("/images/medicBG.jpg") !important;
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        background-position: center;
        background-size: 100%;
    }

    ui-card-panel{
        border-radius: 12px;
    }

    masonry-container{
        background-color : red !important;
        display: flex !important;
        /* flex-direction: Row !important;
        justify-content: center !important;
        align-items: center !important; */
    }

    .test{
        align-self: center ;
        text-align: center !important;
        height: 55vh !important;
        width: 80vw !important;
        display: flex !important;
    }

    .Row{
        align-self: center ;
        text-align: center !important;
        height: 49vh !important;
        width: 30vw !important;
        /* display: flex !important; */
    }

    .Row2{
        align-self: center ;
        text-align: center !important;
        height: 49vh !important;
        width: 45vw !important;
        /* display: flex !important; */
    }

    .Player{
        height: 30vh !important;
        width: 48vh !important;
        align-self : flex-start !important;
        background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.8) !important;
        font-size: 56px;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-cardcontainer {
        /* background-image: url("/images/bc.jpg") !important; */
        background-color: #A1E3F9 !important;
        background-position: center !important;
        background-size: cover !important;
        justify-items: center !important;
        height: 80vh !important;
        width: auto !important;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-cardtitle{
        text-align : center !important;
    }

    .status{
        height : 320px !important;
        align-self : center !important;
    }
</style>
